name: NOWPayments
description: Supports 300+ cryptocurrencies, automatic coin conversion, non-custodial, and easy API for NFT platforms.
target_audience_match: Perfect for Web3 founders who want max flexibility with minimal integration pain.

name: CoinGate
description: Reliable crypto payment gateway with fiat settlement, invoicing, and e-commerce plugins.
target_audience_match: Ideal for NFT platforms or global stores needing crypto + fiat flexibility.

name: Venly Payments
description: NFT-first payment gateway that supports both wallet and credit card payments globally.
target_audience_match: For NFT platforms seeking smooth credit card + wallet payments worldwide.

name: Alchemy Pay
description: Global fiat-to-crypto gateway with card support, compliance tools, and wallet compatibility.
target_audience_match: Great for global NFT projects needing frictionless fiat onramps.

name: MoonPay
description: Mainstream fiat-to-NFT gateway with integrations into major marketplaces and credit card support.
target_audience_match: For platforms onboarding normies via credit card or mobile payments.

name: Transak
description: Regulation-compliant fiat-to-crypto onramp with 170+ token support and developer-friendly APIs.
target_audience_match: For compliance-sensitive NFT platforms needing global coverage.

name: BitPay
description: Enterprise-grade crypto processor trusted by global brands, with fiat conversion and stable settlement.
target_audience_match: Great for established companies adding crypto checkout securely.

name: Coinbase Commerce
description: Trusted crypto payment gateway with major wallet support and optional fiat conversion.
target_audience_match: For platforms that want Coinbase-trusted infrastructure with crypto flexibility.

name: CoinsPaid
description: Crypto-native processor with wallet vaulting, fiat settlement, and broad token support.
target_audience_match: Ideal for projects needing flexible custody and conversion options.

name: BTCPay Server
description: Open-source, self-hosted crypto checkout with full control, privacy, and no third-party risk.
target_audience_match: Best for privacy-first or decentralized NFT communities.

name: Stripe (Web3)
description: Hybrid fiat/crypto processor with wallet top-ups, global KYC, and payout infrastructure.
target_audience_match: For Web3 projects needing fiat integration from a mainstream provider.

name: Crossmint
description: NFT checkout without wallets. Users can pay via email and credit card, no prior crypto experience needed.
target_audience_match: For platforms that need to convert normies fast.

name: Paper.xyz
description: Wallet + credit card checkout built for NFT creators. Handles compliance, UX, and wallet creation.
target_audience_match: Best for NFT drops and membership sites that prioritize UX.

name: Simplex
description: Fiat-to-NFT processor that supports initial mint, resale, and whitelist payments with compliance.
target_audience_match: Useful for mint or whitelist platforms targeting fiat buyers.
